translation: With this seemingly perplexing speech, you seem to be confusing my understanding; therefore, tell me one certain way by which I may attain bliss.
commentary: 3.2 Perplexing by confusion? Like as it were? phrase with speech? understanding the intellect? Mohayasi (Thou) confusest? Like as it were? Me my? That that? One one? Vad tell? Certain for certain? Yen by which? Shreya: bliss (the good or the highest)? I'm I? may attain.Commentary Arjuna says to Lord Krishna? Tecah me one of the two? knowledge or action? by which I may attain to the highest good or bliss or Moksha. (Cf.VI).
